extension.summary: CherryPy webserver packaged as Kodi module
extension.description: CherryPy is a pythonic, object-oriented web framework CherryPy allows developers to build web applications in much the same way they would build any other object-oriented Python program. This results in smaller source code developed in less time. CherryPy is now more than ten years old and it is has proven to be very fast and stable. It is being used in production by many sites, from the simplest to the most demanding.

extension.summary: CherryPy webserver packaged as Kodi module
extension.description: CherryPy is a pythonic, object-oriented web framework CherryPy allows developers to build web applications in much the same way they would build any other object-oriented Python program. It is being used in production by many sites, from the simplest to the most demanding.

extension.summary: Metadata and artwork from common sources like TMDB, IMDB, TADB, OMDB and fanart.tv
Metadatos e ilustraciones de fuentes comunes como TMDB, IMDB, TADB, OMDB y fanart.tv
extension.description: The metadata and artwork module for Kodi provides rich metadata, including artwork for various metatypes by scraping (and caching) this information from sites like TMDB, musicbrainz and fanart.tv. This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

El módulo de metadatos e ilustraciones para Kodi proporciona metadatos enriquecidos, que incluyen ilustraciones paravarios metatipos al raspar (y almacenar en caché) esta información se extrae de sitios como TMDB, musicbrainz and fanart.tv.[CR][CR]Este producto utiliza la API de TMDb pero no está avalado ni certificado por TMDb
extension.news:
v1.0.42 - Fixed ExtraPosters - Fix for "Resume" in dialog v1.0.41 - Fixed ExtraPosters - Fix for "Resume" in dialog v1.0.40 - Fix for missing TADB key v1.0.39 - Remove unicode - Fix for break site Kyradb - Add support for TADB encoding Ascii key - Add new info for TMDB (number_of_seasons, number_of_episodes and Seasons) v1.0.38 - fix for error 'sys' is not defined for extrafanart - fix for google - fix for colecting imdb.250 (movie and tv) - add new rotentomatoes info from omdb v1.0.37 - Smal fix for theaudiodb scraper v1.0.36 - Fix for theaudiodb scraper,Add some new Art thumb and label
v1.0.35 (wuff) - Remove BeautifulSoup3 dependency and use BeautifulSoup4 on Kodi 18 and 19 instead
v1.0.34 (wuff) - Set BeautifulSoup3 and MusicBrainz dependency as optional to allow install on Matrix
v1.0.33 (wuff) - replace xbmc.LOGNOTICE with xbmc.LOGINFO as LOGNOTICE was removed
v1.0.32 (wuff) - Remove python requirement for Kodi 18/19 compat - Change imdb Top250 parsing from lxml to html.parser - replace xbmc.translatePath with xmbcvfs.translatePath v1.0.31 (berkhornet) - Further fixes for PVR artwork v1.0.30 (berkhornet) - Kodi 19/Python 3 - Fixes for PVR artwork - Fix display of artwork when manually selecting from TVDB - Fixes for animated art and google v1.0.29 (wuff) - Remove python requirement for Kodi 18/19 compat v1.0.28 (wuff) - Kodi 19/Python 3 fixes v1.0.27 (finkleandeinhorn) - update omdb api key v1.0.26 (finkleandeinhorn, cartmandos) - enable caching of omdb/tmdb data - remove duplicate "Title" parameter v1.0.25 (marcelveldt) - Last version 30 Mar 2018

v1.1.37 - fix for saveskinimage - Update listitem_monitor.py v1.1.36 - Hungarian lang created - remove get_repo_addoninfo - Fix for "Resume" in dialog v1.1.35 - fix setskinconstant
v1.1.34 - fix correct skin settings - Fix for skinstring, selectimage, and overlayertexture - Fix for resourceaddons - Matrix Py3 changes v1.1.32 - fix for search dialog - add TMDB for TVShow - fix for webservice (now use just TMDB Art-Poster and fanart)
v1.1.31 - fix urllib.parse vs urlparse in utils for Kodi 18 - add commits from Angelinas1
v1.1.30 - fix module import of context menu items
v1.1.29 - compatibility change for CherryPy 17.4.2 and bump version requirement
v1.1.28 - replace xbmc.LOGNOTICE with xbmc.LOGINFO as LOGNOTICE was removed
v1.1.27 - Replace xbmc.translatePath with xbmcvfs.translatePath for Kodi 19 compat
v1.1.26 - Remove python dependency for Kodi18/19 compatibility - minor fix
v1.1.25 - Kodi 19/Python 3 compatibility - minor fixes

extension.description: Сваля информация за предстоящите ТВ сериали. Вече никога няма да пропускате епизод от ТВ сериали, които следите.
Agafar informació de les sèries de TV que es retransmetran pròximament. No te'n perdràs cap mai més.

TV Show Next Aired liefert Termin-Informationen über die anstehenden Episoden der Serien aus der Datenbank. Dazu gibt es eine Wochenansicht mit allen in der nächsten Woche laufenden Episoden sowie (bei vorhandenem Skin Support) die direkte Integration der Informationen in die Ansichten des jeweiligen Skins. Sie werden nie wieder eine Folge verpassen.
Λήψη πληροφοριών για την Επόμενη Προβολή των Τηλ. Σειρών. Δε θα ξαναχάσετε επεισόδιο ποτέ.
Get info for TV Shows Next Aired. You'll never miss one again.
Get info for TV Shows Next Aired. You'll never miss one again.
Get info for TV Shows Next Aired. You'll never miss one again.
Obtener información de las siguientes emisiones de series. Nunca te perderás una de nuevo.
Obtener información de las siguientes emisiones de series. Nunca te perderás una de nuevo.
Ce script interroge votre médiathèque puis vas récupérer les infos sur les prochaines diffusions de vos séries. vous n'en manquerez plus aucune.
Obtenir les infos de prochaine diffusion des séries télé. Vous n'en manquerez plus jamais une.
Obter a info. das Seguintes Emisións das Series de TV. Non esquecerá ningunha.

Gauti TV laidos kitos transliacijos informaciją. Jūs niekada daugiau jos nepraleisite.
Ophalen info voor komende TV shows. Je zult ze nooit meer missen.

Pobieraj informacje o odcinkach seriali wkrótce na antenie. Nigdy już żadnego nie przegapisz.
Obter info para Próximas Exibições de Séries TV. Nunca mais vai perder uma.
Saiba sobre próximas exibições de séries de TV. Você nunca perderá um episódio.
Află despre emisiuni care urmează să fie difuzate. Nu vei mai rata nici una.
Получает информацию о следующих ТВ передачах. Теперь Вы никогда не пропустите ни одну ТВ передачу.

获取即将播出的剧集的信息。你不会再错过好节目了。

addon.name: T i t a n - M O D (BETA) for MATRIX

extension.summary: Обликът "Titan MOD BETA for Kodi Matrix" за MediaPortal адаптиран за Kodi, с много добавени функции.
MediaPortal's Titan MOD BETA for Kodi Matrix Skin portiert für Kodi mit jeder Menge neuer Funktionen und einer vollständigen MediaBrowser Integration.
Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features.
MediaPortal's Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features.
MediaPortal's Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features.
MediaPortal's Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features.
El skin Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix de MediaPortal, portado a Kodi y enriquecido con muchas funciones.
Perustuu MediaPortalin Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix-ulkoasuun.
L'habillage Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix de MediaPortal adapté à Kodi et enrichi avec de nombreuses fonctionnalités
המעטפת Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix שבמקור נוצרה עבור MediaPortal, שודרגה ביכולות רבות ושילוב מלא של MediaBrowser.
MediaPortal Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix presvlaka prebačena na Kodi i obogaćena s puno dodatnih mogućnosti.
La skin di MediaPortal Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix arriva su Kodi arricchita con molte feature e piena integrazione di MediaBrowser
MediaPortal'o Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix teminė išvaizda perkelta į Kodi ir papildyta daugybe funkcijų bei pilna MediaBrowser integracija.
Kulit Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix MediaPortal diport ke Kodi ditambahbaik dengan pelbagai fitur.
De Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrixskin van MediaPortal is geconverteerd naar Kodi en verrijkt met talloze functionaliteiten
Skóra Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix przeniesiona z programu MediaPortal do Kodi wzbogacona o dodatkowe funkcje.
A skin Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix portada do MediaPortal para o Kodi foi enriquecida com várias funcionalidades.
Обложка Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix была портирована с MediaPortal на Kodi и обзавелась множеством новых возможностей
Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix маска MediaPortala портована за Kodi обогаћена са доста карактеристика.
Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix maska MediaPortala portovana za Kodi obogaćena sa dosta karakteristika.
MediaPortal'ın Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix dış görünümü, pek çok özellikle zenginleştirilerek Kodi'ye aktarıldı.
MediaPortal's Titan MOD Matrix for Kodi Matrix 皮肤富含大量的功能。
